name: Dine & Dash
description:
Dine & Dash : a game about the worst crime ever, leaving the Restaurant without paying the bill.

This game was created during the Game Jam of the Next Level (Festival for Games) 2016 in Düsseldorf. Given Time: 3 Days.

Controls: Movement (WASD) Sprint (Left Shift) Crouch (Left CTRL) Open Doors (E)

Developed by: Alexander Frey; Moe Al Kasm

Engine: Unreal Engine 4.13.2

Human Models: http://www.makehuman.org/

BG Music: https://bluejacketmusic1.bandcamp.com/track/blue-j...

Audio assets: https://www.freesound.org/
